query: SELECT p.id, p.orderNumber, p.areaId, p.isExcluded, pm.id as pendingMatchId, pm.status as pendingStatus FROM purchases p LEFT JOIN pendingMatches pm ON p.id = pm.purchaseId WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000439'
